revised_title: Sir William Hudson: A Pioneering Engineer of the Snowy Mountains Scheme
tldr: The article is a biography of Sir William Hudson, a prominent civil engineer known for his work on the Snowy Mountains Scheme in Australia. Born in New Zealand, Hudson studied engineering in London and worked on various hydroelectric projects in New Zealand, Australia, and Scotland before leading the Snowy Mountains Scheme, which became his most significant achievement. His dedication, leadership, and engineering prowess made him a key figure in the development of Australia's hydroelectric resources.
